text.text_translated:
Auggie decides to go to school. Then he has his first day. He is very nervous. All children are nervous at a new school. But Auggie looks different. So his first day is very, very difficult. He has a bad feeling, and it does not stop.

Nobody wants to sit next to him. He sees other kids look at him for a long time. They also talk about him secretly. Luckily, he makes two friends. He makes friends with a boy named Jack. He also makes friends with a girl named Summer. He talks to her at lunch.

But the first day is not the only hard day. Soon, Auggie learns something sad. The other kids do not want to touch him. They are scared to get a sickness called 'the plague'. During the school year, some days are very good for Auggie. But some days are very bad. In the end, something very bad and surprising happens at a school camp. This scary event changes everything.
